Copying stock images to your SD card or internal memory…

Pair your Android device to PIXEL which will show up as 'IOIO' in Bluetooth using code 4545.

Tap an image to display it on PIXEL.

Swipe from left to right to start a Slide Show and swipe from right to left to stop the Slide Show.

Note the last image will remain displayed on PIXEL even after your Android device is switched off.

Follow the instructions below to add your own images to this app:

Connect your Android device to your computer with a USB cable.

From your computer, open your Android device and copy your images to the pixel/pixelart folder of your SD card or internal storage if your device does not have a removeable SD card.

After done copying, select Rescan from this app's menu

You can also delete the sample images leaving only your images.

You'll get the best results by pre-scaling your images to 32x32 resolution.

Any image not in 32x32 resolution will be scaled automatically to 32x32.
